= git tag =

Git allows tagging moments in the repo's history, for example releases.

== Viewing tags ==
Type `git tag`, `git tag --list` or `git tag -l` to list all tags.
After `git tag -l/--list`, a list of patterns can be specified. Then, only tags matching at least one pattern will be shown. 
For info on tags, see [[Git tags]].
To show info on a specific tag, see [[git show]].
